item.title: An idea for how the bots would use the Moscowboy
item.author: invalid@example.com (Da Spadger)
item.dc:creator: Da Spadger
item.content:encoded:
From what i know, bots do not use the moscomboy, because they would suicide the second they saw an enemy. I think i have an idea that i think wouldn't be too hard to implement codewise in next version of CLN. (Get yer coders ready! )

Firstly, bots quits the MB automaticlly when activating the Kamikaze attack. Secondly, they'd rather attack vehicles rather than infantry, unless the infantry is carrying a clone jar. If the MB driver attacks an enemy player without a Clone jar, they exit the...

An idea for how the bots would use the Moscowboy

item.title: I get a bug....
item.author: invalid@example.com (metroidrox)
item.dc:creator: metroidrox
item.content:encoded:
UT2004 Build UT2004_Build_[2005-02-15_17.02]

OS: Windows XP 5.1 (Build: 2600)
CPU: GenuineIntel Unknown processor @ 3195 MHz with 1022MB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce 6800 (7184)

MutStuntMan CLN-PerilPlateau.MutStuntMan (Function Engine.Mutator.CheckReplacement:0000) Infinite script recursion (250 calls) detected

History: FFrame::Serialize <- UObject:rocessEvent <- (FlakAttachment CLN-PerilPlateau.FlakAttachment, Function Engine.Actor.PreBeginPlay) <- ULevel::SpawnActor <-...

I get a bug....

item.title: Bot accuracy?
item.author: invalid@example.com (Eridius)
item.dc:creator: Eridius
item.content:encoded:
I don't know if this is a real bug or not, but it feels like the bots are much more accurate with the car machine guns (and other weapons too, but most noticible with car machine guns) than they ought to be. I don't know if Clone Bandits does anything with bot accuracy, but if you guys *do* then take a look at it. They almost *never* miss with the car machine guns even if I'm flipping them over with my rockets.

So like I said, I don't know if this is your fault or not, but if you are...

Bot accuracy?

item.title: tiny bug might be more UT side though
item.author: invalid@example.com (kanonfodder)
item.dc:creator: kanonfodder
item.content:encoded:
Once I blow up a pump, I drive at the pump and jump out hit the pump to turn it my color and then jump back in the vehicle. Three times last night I was able to get myself stuck in the pump doing this. Two of the times I was close enough to the vehicle to get back in it, but once the vehicle was alas too far away so I got to wait around till someone killed me.

Other than that really enjoy it, need more people to play

item.title: dropping clone jars
item.author: invalid@example.com (UT-Vehicle-Fan)
item.dc:creator: UT-Vehicle-Fan
item.content:encoded:
I have found a bug in the version 1.1 with one the Bots very easily can be defeat:
You go with a Moscowboy beside the enemy's Clone Jars and take a Clone Jar and dropp it with the Moscowboy.
Then you repeat this several times.The bots won't come and return all Clone Jars you dropped.
Is it possible to make a Script for preventing that one rides with a Clone Jar on a Moscowboy?

item.title: Cars are not completely solid
item.author: invalid@example.com (Eridius)
item.dc:creator: Eridius
item.content:encoded:
Many times I have shot rockets through the bottom of a car. Each time I expected it to hit the car and possibly flip it. Instead the rockets goes right through the car. It seems that the bottom third, maybe the bottom half of the car is insubstantial. This is *extremely* annoying, because I'm losing clones because I can't hit the car when I should have. Please fix the collision detection for the cars.

And speaking of collision detection, the peaks on top of peril plateau seem to have a...

Cars are not completely solid

item.title: Bots and car machine gun
item.author: invalid@example.com (Eridius)
item.dc:creator: Eridius
item.content:encoded: The bots seem to be able to fire from the 2nd gunner spot in a car while driving without having a 2nd person in the car. I've seen a bot hop into a car and start shooting from the 2nd gunner spot (I know it was that one because I was behind the car) and drive at the same time despite there being a single bot in the car.

item.title: Musics download problem
item.author: invalid@example.com (Elektordi)
item.dc:creator: Elektordi
item.content:encoded: All links in the music section of http://www.demiurgestudios.com/CloneBandits/download.htm are broken...

item.title: Moscowboy detonation
item.author: invalid@example.com (Southern)
item.dc:creator: Southern
item.content:encoded:
When you're supposed to jump off the Moscowboy, before it explodes, the bike is supposed to travel a short distance until its timer runs out and it explodes. But sometimes, I've noticed that the bike will continue to fly around regardless of how little time is left, meaning that it begins ricocheting haphazardly against walls and things until it either hits the ground and explodes or merely disappears from the game.

This does add a certain extra element of lunacy however; to carry on...

Moscowboy detonation

item.content:encoded:
hello

what do i have to do

item.title: a bug (yeah i found it right after 1.1 release :( )
item.author: invalid@example.com (Screech)
item.dc:creator: Screech
item.content:encoded:
hey guys,

I know this is the last thing you want to hear right after releasing 1.1,....but I found a bug.

if you drive right up to a pump with your car with the pump right on your left (like, your car is touching it) and you get out of your car, you get out and are under/inside the pump (Personally I think it is kinda cool at times, as it makes it easier to lie in wait for an innocent enemy who wants to capture the pump...... but I figured I should report it anyway.

item.title: de-install problem (.zip-File)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Blackus)
item.dc:creator: Blackus
item.content:encoded:
How do I uninstall this Mod? I installed it under Linux with the .zip-File. It crashed my whole UT2004, so that only mods work. When I start my normal UT2004, and select Instant Action, I only see "Standard Gametypes" with nothing in there, and "Other Gametype" with "Clone Bandits". I deleted all the files which where extracted from the .zip-File, but that didn't work. I still haven't got my original UT back. So, what is the matter? Where is my mistake? What do I have to do? I don't want to...

de-install problem (.zip-File)

item.title: Bouncing Flamingo Mine
item.author: invalid@example.com (TheForgotten)
item.dc:creator: TheForgotten
item.content:encoded:
I'm not sure if this is a bug, or even how it happened. But I once saw a flamingo mine bouncing along side my barracuda. I was so shocked by this that when the flamingo rebounded off the terrain and landed in front of me, I just drove right on in - BOOM.

Has anyone else ever seen this?
Does anyone else know how it may have happened? (I think a lounge tank may have exploded behind me just before this happened but I'm not sure)

item.title: Bug in Moscowboy
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dracarys)
item.dc:creator: Dracarys
item.content:encoded: This is probably a redundant thread, but whenever I am moving (and pointed) straight up or closse to it in the Moscowboy, it starts spinning around the Z axis at insane speeds. Perhaps this is because it uses the global Z axis as a reference for its turns, instead of the local? If so, I believe a fix wouldn't be too hard, and would be much appreciated. If there's some other cause, a fix would still be appreciated . Thanks, and great mod!

item.title: Vehicle headlights bug
item.author: invalid@example.com (cravensmythe)
item.dc:creator: cravensmythe
item.content:encoded:
I have noticed a bug with the vehicle headlights

If you start ut2k4 then select a clone bandits map to either host / join / instant action and play it you will notice all the vehicles lights are lit up but no beams of light are emmitted onto surfaces.

If you then start a clone bandits game by double clicking a clone bandits map in your C:\ut2004\maps folder it starts an instant action game and the vehicles emmit fantastic lighting effects, particularly the tank which has lights like 10...

Vehicle headlights bug

item.title: Bug with dedicated server
item.author: invalid@example.com (cravensmythe)
item.dc:creator: cravensmythe
item.content:encoded:
Wonder if anyone had any idea's particularly clone bandit dev guys to this problem.

I have been hosting the new beta map and have been suffering from it crashing out randomly so I have set up server logging and this is what is outputted just beofre the crash

It appears to tbe the clone jar hashing problem that triggers the failure

What do you think?

Log: Octree Warning (RemoveActor): RedCloneJar moved without proper hashing
NetComeGo: Close TcpipConnection 82.38.65.149:4924...

Bug with dedicated server

item.title: Errata in readme
item.author: invalid@example.com (AmeriDan)
item.dc:creator: AmeriDan
item.content:encoded:
I found this in the readme.txt after I dl'd the mod last nite:

readme.txt wrote: said:
-Moscowboy-

The 'Cuda is the workhorse of the Clone Bandits landscape. With good
speed, nitrous boosts, and a passenger gunner seat, the Barracuda is
flexible enough for base assault or pump defense. With air control,
a skilled 'Cuda driver can recharge nitrous stores and fly past the
opposition.

Controls

Mouselook: Steer
Forward: Gas
Backward: Reverse
Use: Get on...
Click to expand...
Errata in readme

item.title: few bugs
item.author: invalid@example.com (Screech)
item.dc:creator: Screech
item.content:encoded:
the first one has only happened to me online and when i was playing on the clown server i think. What happens is, sometimes a pump that is controlled by a team has no color, although it shows correctly on the map. However it is still attackable or defendable, depending on your team. just in case its a vid card problem i have a geforce 4 mx 440.

2nd bug

I apologize in advance for the lack of screenies. that said, there are a couple spots on the map where you can go up to a wall...

few bugs
